sqlMap.sql: delete from LNSBASICINFODYN where ACCTNO = :acctno and OPENBRC = :openbrc

insert into LNSBASICINFODYN (ACCTNO, OPENBRC, SUMPRIN, SUMINT, SUMDINT, SUMCINT, SUMGINT, TUNNELDATA, MODIFYTIME, SUMLBCDINT, TRANDATE) values (:acctno, :openbrc, :sumprin, :sumint, :sumdint, :sumcint, :sumgint, :tunneldata, current timestamp, :sumlbcdint, :trandate)

update LNSBASICINFODYN set SUMPRIN = :sumprin, SUMINT = :sumint, SUMDINT = :sumdint, SUMCINT = :sumcint, SUMGINT = :sumgint, TUNNELDATA = :tunneldata, MODIFYTIME = current timestamp, SUMLBCDINT = :sumlbcdint, TRANDATE = :trandate where ACCTNO = :acctno and OPENBRC = :openbrc
select ACCTNO, OPENBRC, SUMPRIN, SUMINT, SUMDINT, SUMCINT, SUMGINT, TUNNELDATA, MODIFYTIME, SUMLBCDINT, TRANDATE from LNSBASICINFODYN where ACCTNO = :acctno and OPENBRC = :openbrc
